00008 #ifndef  __PLANE_H
00009 #define  __PLANE_H
00010 
00011 #include "clst.h"
00012 #include <list.h>
00013 
00014 class  PlaneCell : public List
00015 {
00016     public :
00017      PlaneCell():List() {pattern = 0;}
00018 #ifndef __MSDOS__
00019      ~PlaneCell(){};
00020 #endif
00021   virtual classType       myNo()const  { return PlaneCellClass; }
00022   virtual char           *myName()const  { return "PlaneCell"; }
00023 
00024 
00025     clusterMapType  pattern;
00026 
00027 };
00028 
00029 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00030 //
00031 // An array of cluster maps in placement area .One cell represents
00032 // one cluster of sectors.Coordinates counted from bottom-left
00033 // corner.
00034 //
00035 
00036 class  Plane
00037 {
00038   public  :
00039     Plane( int rows,int cols);
00040     ~Plane();
00041 
00042   inline  clusterMapType        getPattern(int x,int y);
00043   inline  List&                 getCriticals(int x,int y);
00044 
00045   inline  void                  mark(int x,int y,clusterMapType,List &);
00046   void                          getEffSize(int& x,int& y);
00047 
00048   int  rows;
00049   int  cols;
00050 
00051 
00052   private  :
00053 
00054   inline  Boolean               chk(int ,int );
00055 
00056   PlaneCell  **array;
00057 
00058 };
00059 
00060 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00061 inline  Boolean   Plane::chk(int x,int y)
00062 //
00063 //  returns 0 if legal cluster coord.
00064 {
00065   return (Boolean(x<0 || x>=cols || y<0 || y>=rows));
00066 
00067 }// Plane::chk  //
00068 
00069 
00070 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00071 inline  clusterMapType Plane::getPattern(int x,int y)
00072 //
00073 // Returns given cluster map.If coordinates are out of range
00074 // returns filled out map  what means that this one is already occupied.
00075 //
00076 {
00077 
00078   if( chk(x,y) )
00079     return ~0x0;                       // to set all bits
00080   else
00081     return array[x][y].pattern;
00082 
00083 }// Plane::getPattern  //
00084 
00085 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00086 inline  List&      Plane::getCriticals(int x,int y)
00087 //
00088 // returns list of critical points already in cluster (x,y)
00089 {
00090   if ( chk(x,y) )
00091     return (List&)NOITEM;
00092   else
00093     return (List&)array[x][y];
00094 
00095 }// Plane::getCriticals  //
00096 
00097 
00098 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00099 inline  void  Plane::mark(int x,int y,clusterMapType map,List &critListRef)
00100 //
00101 //  marks new used sectors and
00102 //  adds list of critical points to our list.
00103 {
00104   if( ! chk(x,y) )
00105   {
00106     array[x][y].pattern |= map;
00107 
00108     array[x][y] |= critListRef;
00109   }
00110 }// Plane::mark  //
00111 
00112 
00113 #endif
